sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_appn">
    <x_snc_nnemc0_appn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <appn_code>OMN</appn_code>
        <appn_desc>O&MN funds are used for expenses, not otherwise provided for, necessary for the operation
and maintenance of the Navy and Marine Corps, as authorized by law. Per the
Expense/Investment criteria, equipment purchases under this appropriation are limited to a
system unit price of less than $250,000. This limitation is subject to change by Congress,
and the current limitation is contained in the DoD FMR, 010201. O&MN funds are available
for new obligations for one fiscal year and are appropriated and authorized for use on an
annual basis. This appropriation funds SUPSHIPs' operations and includes salaries, general
and administrative (G&A), travel, and training costs. </appn_desc>
        <appn_type>Operations & Maintenance, Navy</appn_type>
        <number>APPN0001001</number>
        <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_appn</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 14:56:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>abece7d6db1d23008e9357935e9619d8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 15:00:42</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_nnemc0_appn>
</record_update>
